headline: Dow and Gruppo Fiori develop breakthrough recycling process for automotive polyurethane waste
summary: Collaboration delivers novel process to recover polyurethane foam from end-of-life vehicles, driving critical progress toward closed-loop circularity for the automotive industry Recover. Reuse. Back on the Road Dow and Gruppo Fiori are closing the loop on automotive polyurethanes - turning end-of-life foam waste into feedstocks for new foams through chemical recycling. Building a Closed-Loop PU Supply Chain Working across the auto-recycling ecosystem, Dow and Gruppo Fiori aim to streamline colle
